short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to download the embedded orgchars created with orgchart.com as a CSV file

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will provide a download option for the orgcharts embedded in a page from orgchart.com. It will extract all the data as a CSV file. Great for Unions and WorksCouncil.
Just install the extension. When you visit a page that allows to download the orgchart, the extension icon will get green.
Click on it to download the CSV file.
Done!
